tests.title: should check if the window count is 1
tests.fullTitle: TEST THE WINDOW Opened window count should check if the window count is 1
tests.code:
return App.client
    .waitUntilWindowLoaded()
    .getWindowCount()
    .should.eventually.equal(1);
